name: Vibrant Square Grid
description: A grid of colorful, layered squares with shifting lines and thickness. Randomness in color and stroke gives each square a lively, hand-drawn energy.

name: Sound Orbit
description: Colorful ellipses orbit and mirror each other in smooth, wave-like motion. Random tones play on click, blending visual rhythm with generative sound.

name: Bouncing Color Orbs
description: Ellipses bounce across the canvas, mirrored in all corners. Random sizes and colors create a lively, dynamic pattern that responds subtly to motion.

name: Layered Mountains
description: A series of layered, mountainous shapes created with noise. Each layer has subtle transparency, giving depth and a soft, atmospheric effect.

name: Flowing Noise Waves
description: Layers of wavy, flowing lines created with noise and subtle randomness. The gradient colors and gentle motion evoke a calm, organic rhythm across the canvas.

name: Wobbly Squares Grid
description: A grid of layered squares with slightly offset corners, creating a subtle, irregular effect. The randomness adds a playful, dynamic feel to a structured layout.

name: Layered Squares Grid
description: A grid of layered squares with slightly randomized vertices, creating a colorful, wobbly effect. Each square varies subtly, blending structure with playful irregularity.

name: Scribbled Circles Grid
description: A grid of circles filled with moving points, creating a subtle, scribbled texture. Some circles are black, others soft colors, blending structure with organic motion.

name: Midnight Currents
description: Thousands of blue particles flow through a noise-generated field, forming shifting, wave-like trails on a dark background. A digital simulation of motion and calm.
